00040   /*     setupSelfDoc(*this); */

00043 /** 
00044  * @brief Virtual destructor for a virtual class.
00045  */
00046 ChipStream::~ChipStream() {
00047   if (m_Streams.size() == 0) {
00048     delete m_TransformedIMart;
00049   }
00050 }

00052 /** 
00053  * Fill in the information for Self documentation.
00054  * @param doc - Self documenter to be filled in.
00055  */
00056 void ChipStream::setupSelfDoc(SelfDoc &doc) {
00057   doc.setDocName("no-trans");
00058   doc.setDocDescription("Placeholder chipstream that does no transformation");
00059   doc.setDocOptions(getDefaultDocOptions());
00060 }

00062 /** 
00063  * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00064  * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00065  * @return SelfDoc
00066  */
00067 SelfDoc ChipStream::explainSelf() { 
00068   SelfDoc doc;
00069   setupSelfDoc(doc);
00070   return doc;

00073 /** 
00074  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00075  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00076  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00077  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00078  * 
00079  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00080  * 
00081  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00082  */
00083 SelfCreate *ChipStream::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string> &param) {
00084   SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00085   ChipStream *cs = new ChipStream();
00086   return cs;
00087 }

00089 /** 
00090  * @Brief Add a stream to the list of those that will receive
00091  * downstream data.
00092  * @param stream - ChipStream that wants to be fed our modified
00093  * data.
00094  */
00095 void ChipStream::registerStream(ChipStream *stream) {
00096   m_Streams.push_back(stream);
00097 }
00098   
00099 /** 
00100  * @brief register our parent stream that will be passing
00101  * data to this object.
00102  * @param stream - who are we getting data from?
00103  */
00104 void ChipStream::registerParent(ChipStream *stream) {
00105   m_ParentStream = stream;
00106 }
00107 
00108 /** 
00109  * @brief Get a reference to our parent stream.
00110  * @return Reference to parent stream.
00111  */
00112 const ChipStream &ChipStream::getParent() {
00113   return *m_ParentStream;
00114 }

00116 /** 
00117  * @brief Method for being passed a new cel file worth of data.
00118  * @param iMart - repository of intensities for all CEL files in analysis
00119  */
00120 void ChipStream::newDataSet(IntensityMart* iMart) {
00121   m_TransformedIMart = iMart;
00122   chipStreamPassNewChip(iMart);
00123 }

00125 void ChipStream::newChip(std::vector<float> &data) {};

00127 void ChipStream::finishedChips() {};
00128 
00129 /** 
00130  * @brief Signal that no more data is coming (i.e. newChip() will
00131  * not be called anymore.
00132  */
00133 void ChipStream::endDataSet() {
00134   chipStreamEndChips();
00135 }

00137 /** 
00138  * @brief Set the minimum subset of a chip that this stream needs to
00139  * see for initialization.
00140  * @param subset - bitmask of probes.
00141  */
00142 void ChipStream::setMinimumSubset(std::vector<bool> &subset) {
00143   unsigned int i = 0;
00144   for(i = 0; i < m_Streams.size(); i++) 
00145     m_Streams[i]->setMinimumSubset(subset);
00146 }

00164  * @param intensity - CEL intensity
00165  * @param board - Blackboard with various state data

00167 float ChipStream::transform(int probeIx, int chipIx, float intensity, PsBoard &board) {
00168   return transform(probeIx, chipIx, intensity);

00171 /**
00172  * @brief Retrieve intensity from resident IntensityMart
00173  *
00174  * @param probeIx - Probe index on chip.
00175  * @param chipIx - Set of chip indexes from same sample.
00176  * @param channelIx - CEL file channel to retrieve intensity from
00177  */
00178 float ChipStream::getTransformedIntensity(probeidx_t probeIx, chipidx_t chipIx, unsigned int channelIx) {
00179   float intensity = 0.0;
00180 
00181   if (m_TransformedIMart != NULL) {
00182     intensity = m_TransformedIMart->getProbeIntensity(probeIx, chipIx, channelIx);
00183   }
00184   else {
00185     Err::errAbort("ChipStream::getTransformedIntensity -- associated IntensityMart is NULL");
00186   }
00187   return intensity;
00188 }

00204 /** 
00205  * @brief Method for being passing a new cel file worth of data to children.
00206  * @param iMart - IntensityMart of intensities to be initialized
00207  */
00208 void ChipStream::chipStreamPassNewChip(IntensityMart* iMart) {
00209   unsigned int i = 0;
00210   for(i = 0; i < m_Streams.size(); i++) {
00211     m_Streams[i]->newDataSet(iMart);
00212   }
00213 }
00214 
00215 /** 
00216  * @brief Signal children that no more data is coming (i.e. newChip() will
00217  * not be called anymore.
00218  */
00219 void ChipStream::chipStreamEndChips() {
00220   if (m_Streams.size() > 0) {
00221     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Streams.size(); i++) {
00222       m_Streams[i]->endDataSet();
00223     }
00224     m_TransformedIMart = NULL;
00225   }
00226 }
